abhd.title: One of the most common neurodevelopmental disorders during childhood these days is ADHD
abhd.description: Children with ADHD may have trouble paying attention, controlling impulsive behaviors (acting without thinking about consequences), or being overly active

alzheimer-disease.title: Alzheimer's disease
alzheimer-disease.description: Alzheimer's disease is a persistent neurological disorder that causes the brain to shrink and brain cells to perish. Alzheimer's disease slowly destroys memory, reasoning and thinking skills and, eventually, the ability to carry out the simplest day-to-day tasks
